results.thought: Use a pre-printf breakpoint (main+0x13f) to verify only 12-length input reaches the success print.
results.notes: GDB breakpoint before success printf; run 11/12/13-char inputs to validate length gate.

results.thought: Dump .rodata and pinpoint the constant at offset +0x2a with surrounding strings for validation.
results.notes: Dump .rodata to spot small constants/strings likely used by hash; cheap confirmation.

results.thought: Dump and inspect GOT/PLT relocations to correlate unresolved symbols and callsites.
results.notes: Map PLT/GOT addrs for scanf/EVP; anchors for breakpoints; quick and reliable.

results.thought: Resolve libcrypto path and exports to understand symbol-versioned names for EVP_*.
results.notes: ldd + readelf -s on libcrypto to get exact versioned EVP names for setting breakpoints.

results.thought: Profile ELF mitigations (PIE/NX/canary) to quantify overflow exploitability preconditions.
results.notes: Check PIE/NX/canary to assess overflow feasibility; quick but low impact for rev goal.
